HomePage.description: This is the preliminary navigation point for users to login or register. Homepage includes a general overview of the website along with its main features.
functions: User Authentication: Registering, logging in and resetting password
Presentation: Brief overview of the website's purpose, usage instructions, and highlighting important features

Dashboard.description: After logging in, users land on the Dashboard. Here they can overview their schedules, tasks, and onboard new users.
functions: View Schedules: Overview of personal, shared schedules, upcoming tasks and important deadlines
Onboarding: Step-by-step assistance guiding new users through the features or inviting new users to the platform
Feedback Channels: Links to a feedback page, quick survey prompts or chat support
Goal-Aligned Features: Personalize dashboard to align with the user's goals

Calendar.description: Detailed view of tasks and events. Users can organize, create and modify their schedules here.
functions: Task scheduling: Create, edit, and delete tasks or events
Sharing: Share schedules with other users
Skill-Sharing Features: Information windows for shared skills, tips and tricks
Equal Opportunity to Speak: Allow each user to contribute equally to shared tasks planning in group schedules

Interactions.description: Communication hub for users to discuss tasks, share files and build teamwork.
functions: Chat Feature: Real-time communication between users
File Sharing: Upload, download and share documents relevant to tasks
Sensitive Language Filter: Automated moderation for any problematic language
Agency Rule: Features enabling users with less authority to delegate and manage tasks optimizing collaboration overhead
Nudging Rule: Notifications and prompts to reduce awkward social situations in collaborative tasks

Feedback Page.description: Allows users to provide feedback and suggestions to improve the web interface.
functions: Feedback Form: Form for users to detail their experiences with the interface
Suggestions Box: Allows users to provide suggestions for new features or improvements
Issue Reporting: Users can report bugs, issues and suggest improvements to existing features
